page.title: 19G.O.C.C. FETE.
page.content: On the 22nd of June the Great Oakley Community Council fete was held on the school field. A band from Harwich came to entertain with their bagpipes and drums.Mrs Mills opened the fete the chairman was Lady Hoskyns. Many children took part in the{fancy dress},Jamie Muir came first.Children of{Great Oakley School gave a display of{Gymnastics, sword {dancing and maypole dancing. They also played other schools at{football}and {netball.}One of the most popular stalls was throwing a{wet sponge}at Mr Nicholls who is the Deputy head. As well as the fete, G.O.C.C. organise a May Princess competition and a children's Christmas party at the village hall.They are planting bulbs around the village. Their project now is to get a 'Great Oakley' sign to put in the village.
